movie.title: The Tree
movie.description_intro: The O'Neills lived happily in their house in the Australian countryside. That was until one day fate struck blindly, taking the life of Peter, the father, leaving his grief-stricken wife Dawn alone with their four children. Among them, eight-year-old Simone denies this reality. She is persuaded that her father still lives in the giant fig tree growing near their house and speaks to her through its leaves. But the tree becomes more and more invasive and threatens the house. It must be felled. Of course, Simone won't allow...
movie.description_full: The O'Neills lived happily in their house in the Australian countryside. That was until one day fate struck blindly, taking the life of Peter, the father, leaving his grief-stricken wife Dawn alone with their four children. Among them, eight-year-old Simone denies this reality. She is persuaded that her father still lives in the giant fig tree growing near their house and speaks to her through its leaves. But the tree becomes more and more invasive and threatens the house. It must be felled. Of course, Simone won't allow...

movies.title: The Death & Life of John F. Donovan
movies.title_english: The Death & Life of John F. Donovan
movies.title_long: The Death & Life of John F. Donovan (2018)
movies.summary: A decade after the death of an American television star, a young actor reminisces about the written correspondence he shared with him, as well as the impact those letters had on both their lives.
movies.description_full: A decade after the death of an American television star, a young actor reminisces about the written correspondence he shared with him, as well as the impact those letters had on both their lives.
movies.synopsis: A decade after the death of an American television star, a young actor reminisces about the written correspondence he shared with him, as well as the impact those letters had on both their lives.

movies.title: Circumstance
movies.summary: A wealthy Iranian family struggles to contain a teenager's growing sexual rebellion and her brother's dangerous obsession.
movies.description_full: A wealthy Iranian family struggles to contain a teenager's growing sexual rebellion and her brother's dangerous obsession.
movies.synopsis: A wealthy Iranian family struggles to contain a teenager's growing sexual rebellion and her brother's dangerous obsession.

movies.title: The Tiger's Tail
movies.summary: After a chance encounter, a Dubliner stalked by a murderous facsimile of himself.
movies.description_full: After a chance encounter, a Dubliner stalked by a murderous facsimile of himself.
movies.synopsis: After a chance encounter, a Dubliner stalked by a murderous facsimile of himself.

movies.title: Blue Summer
movies.summary: A high school student called Rio is a city girl and lives in Tokyo. It is something of an unknown when her mother informs her that she will be spending the summer holidays in the countryside. Upon arrival there is the mountain, the hills, the forest and the sea. She also meets a boy called Ginzo soon enough and finds herself in love with the handsome boy. They are inseparable.
